item.title: About
item.description: Hi there ðŸŸ¢ This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials. All you have to do is start typing! The theme includes: fully customizable color schemes generated by terminal.css. great reading experience thanks to Fira Code. nice code highlighting thanks to PrismJS that matches the theme’s color scheme. So, there you have it… enjoy!
item.content:
Hi there

ðŸŸ¢

This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials. All you have to do is start typing!

The theme includes:

  • fully customizable color schemes generated by terminal.css.
  • great reading experience thanks to Fira Code.
  • nice code highlighting thanks to PrismJS that matches the theme’s color scheme.

So, there you have it… enjoy!
